author: spearmankahron@gmail.com (Kahron Spearman)
title: CeeLo Shows Up To the Grammys With a Meme-Ready, Ridiculous Gold Outfit
text:
Screengrab via The Internet/Youtube BTW 
Setting off the fashion portion of the Grammys red carpet with a hardy laugh, CeeLo Green showed up on Sunday as the golden version of his new Gnarly Davidson character. And the memes rolled in. 
When first asked about his character by XXL , he gave an appropriately unusual answer: Look at meâ€¦ LOOK AT ME! YOU DID THIS TO ME CEELO GREEN, YOU FUCKING IDIOT. BUT I LIKE IT, Iâ€™m actuallyâ€¦BETTER! Than youâ€¦ than everyone! A karmikaze upon you! Vengeance is mine sayeth GNARLY DAVIDSON. P.S. TECHNOLOJESUS saves. 
Of course, Twitter is ablaze with hilarious reactions. Why is CeeLo Green dressed like a Ferrero Rocher ðŸ˜‚ðŸ’€ #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/Cx63rr77Qg
